page.title: 15HOW LYMM HAS CHANGED
page.content: We put some questions to an old lady who has been living in the Lymm area for 25 years. The questions were to find out how Lymm has changed during the past 25 years. We asked her if the motorway had helped traffic to ease off in Lymm. She said it had at first but it is beginning to get worse. Although it is getting worse she said it could be even worse if it wasn't for the motorway. We asked her if she had noticed any changes since she came to Lymm. She said that it had grown in size and population. All the land around Highfield had been grass for many years. Before the top of Highfield Road was built it was grass fields.
